languages.text: The wearer gains the Dash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can be performed twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Whenever the wearer uses Dash, all adjacent enemies suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: The wearer gains the Dash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can be performed twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Whenever the wearer uses Dash, all adjacent enemies suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Doesn't stack.

The wearer gains the Dash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can be performed twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Whenever the wearer uses Dash, all adjacent enemies suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

languages.text: 装备者获得急速冲刺{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。此能力不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}可以使用两次。 当装备者使用急速冲刺时，所有邻近敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}降低30点，直到装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。 此效果无法叠加。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains the Dash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can be performed twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Whenever the wearer uses Dash, all adjacent enemies suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 装备者获得急速冲刺{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。此能力不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}可以使用两次。 当装备者使用急速冲刺时，所有邻近敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}降低30点，直到装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。 此效果无法叠加。

languages.text: Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Пробежка, не требующую затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, которую можно применять дважды за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Когда персонаж применяет Пробежку, у всех противников на соседних клетках {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} сокращается на 30 до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа. Эффект не суммируется.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains the Dash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can be performed twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Whenever the wearer uses Dash, all adjacent enemies suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Пробежка, не требующую затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, которую можно применять дважды за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Когда персонаж применяет Пробежку, у всех противников на соседних клетках {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} сокращается на 30 до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа. Эффект не суммируется.

Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Пробежка, не требующую затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, которую можно применять дважды за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Когда персонаж применяет Пробежку, у всех противников на соседних клетках {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} сокращается на 30 до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа. Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: 使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストが0のダッシュ{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得し、{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに2回実行できる。 使用者がダッシュを使うたび、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで、隣接する敵すべての{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が30低下する。 この効果はスタックしない。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains the Dash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can be performed twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Whenever the wearer uses Dash, all adjacent enemies suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストが0のダッシュ{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得し、{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに2回実行できる。 使用者がダッシュを使うたび、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで、隣接する敵すべての{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が30低下する。 この効果はスタックしない。

languages.text: El portador obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Carrera, que le cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y puede usarla dos veces por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}. Cada vez que el portador use Carrera, todos los enemigos adyacentes pierden −30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} hasta que comience el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains the Dash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can be performed twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Whenever the wearer uses Dash, all adjacent enemies suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: El portador obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Carrera, que le cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y puede usarla dos veces por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}. Cada vez que el portador use Carrera, todos los enemigos adyacentes pierden −30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} hasta que comience el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: Der Träger erhält die Sprinten-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, die 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet und zweimal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} ausgeführt werden kann. Immer wenn der Träger Sprinten einsetzt, erleiden alle angrenzenden Feinde −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Trägers. Addiert sich nicht.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains the Dash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can be performed twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Whenever the wearer uses Dash, all adjacent enemies suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erhält die Sprinten-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, die 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet und zweimal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} ausgeführt werden kann. Immer wenn der Träger Sprinten einsetzt, erleiden alle angrenzenden Feinde -30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers. Addiert sich nicht.

languages.text: L'utilisateur obtient la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Sprint pour 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et celle-ci peut être utilisée deux fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à la capacité Sprint, tous les ennemis adjacents subissent −30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Non cumulable.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à la capacité Sprint, tous les ennemis adjacents subissent -30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à la capacité Sprint, tous les ennemis adjacents subissent -30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.
